descriptions: ["DescriptionBetter Homes offers 1 bed in Armada Tower 3- Vacant- Service charges: AED: 20,616Armada Towers is a unique 31 storey development of three towers designed to give you that little extra for your investment. These opulent buildings command a central focus and overlook Dubai's most elegant area, with stunning views across the golf course, lakes, islands, gardens and waterfalls at the heart of Jumeirah Lakes. The design of Armada is cutting edge, each tower is a self-contained unit comprising of shops, restaurants and state-of-the-art health facilities including a rooftop pool.JLT is predominantly residential apartment buildings though there are also a few hotels. Access is convenient by car from Sheikh Zayed Road or First Al Khail Road or via 2 metro stops, as well as a stop on the tram route. descriptions: ['DescriptionBeautifully designed with Mosaic flooring dating back to 300 AD, this Entertainment Foyer villa has been carefully upgraded for family living. The kitchen is larger than average, including all appliances and an island in the middle to enjoy breakfast dining and entertaining guests. The living room has double-height ceilings allowing for an abundance of natural light throughout. Onto the garden, the pool area has been fully upgraded to include a spa-like stone waterfall with a gazebo to enjoy those winter days with friends. Real grass has been aligned to the whole garden with an irrigation system attached to be in touch with pure nature. Onto the first level of the home, all bedrooms include en-suite bathrooms. The master room includes a separate living or study room, walk-in wardrobes and balcony expanding over the beautiful gardens. The master en-suite includes a Jacuzzi bath for you to relax and unwind. The driveway includes automated gates as well as floodlights dotted along with the garden. The whole home has built-in security cameras with computer access.']
